title: China Development Bank funded Priority Roads Project 3
decision_details:
- the proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Highways, Ports and Shipping, to award the contracts for the rehabilitation of the following road sections under the Phase I of the Priority Roads Project 3 funded by the  China Development Bank Company Ltd., as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet:

*  C1 Kiriella-Nedurana-Eheliyagoda Road, (0.00 - 14.75 km)

*  C2 Ratnapura-Palawela-Karawita Road, (0.00 - 21.28 km)

*  C3 Ratnapura-Wewalwatta Road, (0.00 - 27.5 km)

*  C4 Veyangoda - Ruwanwella Road, (12.4 - 32.2 km) 
		(Road Package)

*  C4 Veyangoda - Ruwanwella Road, (12.4 - 32.2 km) 
		(Bridge Package)

*  C5 Meegahajandura-Kumaragama Road, (0.00 - 08.80 km)

*  C6 Galle-Udugama Road, (0.00 - 35.35 km)

*  C7 Kandy-Jaffna Road, (1.65 - 3.9 km)

*  C8 Marawila-Udabaddawa Road, (0.00 - 19.55 km)

*  C9 Rambukkana-Katupitiya Road, (0.00 - 8.75 km)

*  C9 Katupitiya-Dambokka Road, (0.00 - 9.81 km)

*  C10 Hiniduma-Opatha-Pitabaddara Road, (0.00 - 31.5 km) (Road Package)

* C10 Hiniduma-Opatha-Pitabaddara Road, (0.00 - 31.5 km) (Bridge Package)
